title: Layouts
description: Master modern CSS layout techniques with Flexbox and Grid for responsive, powerful designs.

lessons.title: Flex Basics
lessons.description: Learn the core properties of Flexbox to align, distribute space, and order items in a container.
lessons.task: Set .flex to display: flex, and center its children both horizontally and vertically.
lessons.previewBaseCSS: body { font-family: sans-serif; padding: 1rem; } .flex > div { background: #eceff1; margin: 0.5rem; padding: 1rem; }

lessons.title: Flex Advanced
lessons.description: Control wrapping, ordering, and flexible growth/shrink of items in a flex container.
lessons.task: Allow items to wrap and set .item to flex: 1 1 100px.
lessons.previewBaseCSS: body { font-family: sans-serif; padding: 1rem; } .item { background: #c5cae9; margin: 0.5rem; padding: 1rem; }

lessons.title: Grid Basics
lessons.description: Define grid containers, set rows and columns, and place items in a structured grid.
lessons.task: Set .grid to display: grid with three equal columns and a 1rem gap.
lessons.previewBaseCSS: body { font-family: sans-serif; padding: 1rem; } .grid > div { background: #ffe082; padding: 1rem; }

lessons.title: Grid Placement
lessons.description: Control the span and position of grid items with grid-column and grid-row.
lessons.task: Span the first grid item across 2 columns using grid-column: 1 / span 2.
lessons.previewBaseCSS: body { font-family: sans-serif; padding: 1rem; } .grid > div { background: #c8e6c9; padding: 1rem; }
